title: If you are a mummy's boy, don't get married! - assim al hakeem
transcript: if you are a mummy's boy don't get married if your mom tells you what to do and what not to do and you're still suckling milk don't get married until you are grown up marriage is a responsibility you take a woman into this affair you take care of her you become her Rock she depends entirely upon you after Allah if you fail to do this you're sinful at the sight of Allah
